body: Globewriter comments on the shocked reactions to the Banton verdict: "The fact is there is video of  Buju Banton chatting with federal agents and tasting the cocaine...and he is now convicted.  What is the problem?"
original_body: Globewriter comments on the shocked reactions to the Banton verdict: "The fact is there is video of Buju Banton chatting with federal agents and tasting the cocaine...and he is now convicted. What is the problem?"
title: Trinidad & Tobago, Jamaica: The Facts About Banton
